function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of emphasis on the design of new governance models using emerging technologies to incorporate contagious disease mitigation strategies.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Literature search on disaster management and open government projects","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited implementation of contingency theory and principal-agent theory in public administration","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate citizen engagement and collaboration in open government projects may lead to ineffective crisis management and response","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of citizen engagement in governance processes","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of citizen participation and engagement in co-creation of solutions","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of diversity and inclusion in construction companies","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Home-related stress and conflicts","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influences of risk perception on consumer behavior in tourism","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perceptions of covid-19 as a travel-associated risk leading to a planned shift in typical travel behaviors.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Correlation between covid-19 risk and travel anxiety, leading to the omission of vacations, reduced international travel, and increased domestic travel.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Development of covid-19 travel risk perception and travel anxiety.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"General anxiety leading to low-risk vacation choices","category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
